note:
I'm here mostly to be silly and gay, as well as explore my gender which is a mess, but exciting :3

I'm an elder millennial, leftist, gay, nonbinary, genderfluid, mostly androgynous, poly with a wonderful boyfriend of 10+ years üíë

Interested in computing, Linux/free software, gaming, transit, urbanism, and being gay. My goal is becoming gayer and cuter üíÖ I love talking with other queer people and occasionally may be flirty/horny (with consent) üòà

Politics is important, but on the internet it just makes me angry in a way that doesn't lead to action, so I talk about it relatively little and will try to CW political posts.

I have a lewd alt where I'll try to keep lewd content, but there still might be some here, which I'll CW. Anyone under 18 should definitely not interact with those.

Follow requests are on. I'll approve if we've interacted and seem cool, queers are almost guaranteed approval. Will usually follow back but might take me a while

I block fascists, reactionaries, bigots, and conservatives üçâ
